title: Rolecard Flipper

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Nobody can be unflipped by any means
- Anyone who visits a flipped player will get flipped
- Flipping someone will flip their role card upside down.
- You start the game flipped.
- Players are informed when they are flipped

desc:
Post 5067
*What's wrong with being upside down?*
